mapper.select: SELECT em.employee_code, em.employee_no, em.name, em.hire_date, em.password, em.employee_position, em.status_type, em.resignation_date, em.hire_type, em.department_code, dp.department_name FROM employees em JOIN department dp ON em.department_code = dp.department_code

SELECT em.employee_code, em.employee_no, em.name, em.hire_date, em.password, em.employee_position, em.status_type, em.resignation_date, em.hire_type, em.department_code, dp.department_name, ed.eng_name, ed.identity_no, ed.head_check, ed.duty, ed.tel, ed.phone, ed.email, ed.emp_status, ed.zipcode, ed.address, ed.detail_address, ed.bacct, ed.depositor, ed.employee_image, ed.bank FROM employees em JOIN department dp ON em.department_code = dp.department_code JOIN employees_detail ed ON em.employee_code = ed.employee_code WHERE em.employee_code = #{employeeCode}
